issue.title: [Python/CI] Add integration test with kartothek
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5265](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5265). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/JDASoftwareGroup/kartothek is a heavy user of Apache Arrow and thus a good indicator whether we have introduced some breakages in `pyarrow`. Thus we should run regular integration tests against it as we do with other libraries.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5265?focusedCommentId=16999049) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
It seems that is enabled on the Karkothek CI. Is it useful to add it to the Arrow CI as well?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5265?focusedCommentId=17058156) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6568
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6568>
